newsitem.title: PHILIPPINES: Basketball-Milkmen wins 4th game, ties PBA series.
newsitem.headline: Basketball-Milkmen wins 4th game, ties PBA series.

text.p: Alaska Milk beat Formula Shell 79-76 on Tuesday evening and evened the best-of-seven final series of the Philippine Basketball Association second conference at two wins each.
Shell threw away a 74-68 lead with a succession of passing errors in the last two minutes of play enabling the Milkmen to pull off the victory.
Rene Hawkins led Alaska's offensive with 24 points while American import Kenny Redfield led Shell with 18.
"We will beat them in Game Five on Friday and in Game Six on Sunday. You'll see red balloons falling on Sunday," Alaska coach Tim Cone said after the hard-earned win.
